description:
Cozy Bowery Apartment. 

1 Bedroom, 1.5 Bathrooms. King Size Bed, Desk/Workstation, Wifi, TV with Netflix-Hulu-HBO, 2 Non Working Fireplaces, Full Kitchen.

Steps to Soho for amazing shopping, and the amazing restaurants and bars of East Village. Whole foods a few blocks away. 

Walking distance to Washington Square Park/NYU, West Village, Union Square, Flatiron, Chinatown.

Entire Apartment.

Available at all times for assistance.

Steps to Soho shopping. In the heart of the BEST bars and restaurants in East Village. Walking distance to Washington Square Park and NYU.

No elevator. 4th Floor.
name: Cozy True 1BR Apartment in Noho/East Village
review: The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
